gestures.description: hand raised near face, fingers pointing upward, expressive 'let me tell you something' gesture
index finger pointing directly at camera, accusatory and engaging
hand up showing number with fingers, counting gesture
hand resting on chest over heart, sincere and personal
chin resting on hand, thoughtful and contemplative
casual peace sign near face, playful energy
palm facing camera in 'wait, hold on' gesture
hand casually touching or playing with hair
hand partially covering mouth like sharing a secret
sarcastic thumbs up with deadpan expression
finger to lips in 'shh' or thoughtful gesture
finger tapping temple, 'think about it' gesture
one hand pressed to heart/chest, sincere or pleading
hand partially covering face, exasperated but relatable
playful finger guns at camera, cheeky energy

expressions.description: slight smirk with raised eyebrow, 'I know something you don't' energy
direct eye contact, slightly intense, truth-bomb energy
eyes wide, eyebrows raised, 'can you believe this?' expression
gentle, genuine half-smile, warm and approachable
biting lower lip, nervous or contemplative
lips pressed together, holding back or processing
looking to the side with suspicious energy
open, vulnerable expression, slightly sad but honest
slightly squinting, head tilted, confused but relatable
playful grin, like about to reveal something juicy
tired but accepting expression, 'I've been through it' energy
both eyebrows raised, 'seriously?' or 'here we go' energy
mid-laugh or just finished laughing, authentic joy

positions.description: standing in front of mirror, classic selfie pose
sitting cross-legged on bed, casual and intimate
lying on bed propped up on elbows, relaxed
lying on bed with head hanging over edge, looking up at camera upside down
curled up on couch with blanket, cozy vibes
sitting on kitchen counter, casual and slightly rebellious
sitting in driver's seat or passenger seat, natural lighting
sitting on floor against wall or bed, grounded
sitting by window with natural light, contemplative
wrapped in blanket like a burrito, only face visible
hugging pillow or stuffed animal, vulnerable but cute
pet sitting in lap while taking selfie
lying flat on floor looking up at camera, dramatic but relatable
very close front camera selfie, intimate and personal
